response:
Dissemination in space (optic nerve and cerebellum) prioritises inflammatory demyelination; vascular and granulomatous/infectious mimics remain possible.

differential_diagnosis = ["Relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis", "MOG antibody-associated disease", "Neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder (AQP4-IgG positive)", "Ischaemic optic neuropathy with left cerebellar infarct", "Neurosarcoidosis", "Syphilitic optic neuritis"]
